name: UnpackApkFile
description: Unpack an apk file to prepare it for modifications.
author: Scott MacDougall

inputs.name: apkPath
inputs.label: Path to apk
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the apk file you want to unpack.

inputs.name: apkToolArgs
inputs.label: ApkTool Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional aruments to pass to ApkTool

outputVariables.name: unpackedApkPath
outputVariables.description: The path to the unpacked apk file.

outputVariables.name: unpackedApkName
outputVariables.description: The name of the original apk file.
